metadata.title: CVE-2016-5115 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - low.
metadata.description: The avcodec_decode_audio4 function in libavcodec in libavformat 57.34.103, as used in MPlayer, allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service (out-of-bounds read) via a crafted mp3 file.

notes.note: mdeslaur> no details as of 2016-10-18 ebarretto> no details as of 2019-03-01

criterions.comment: ffmpeg package in hirsute is affected and may need fixing.
